testcase.name: Part create without quantity
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Part create without quantity Given a set of specific parts ... skipped in 0.000s | name | description | quantity | | partA | descriptionA | 10 | | partB | descriptionB | 0 | | partC | descriptionC | 0 | And I read all "part" ... skipped in 0.000s When I create a "part" called "partD" ... skipped in 0.000s Then I should see the "name" is "partD" ... skipped in 0.000s And I should see the "quantity" is number "0" ... skipped in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Parts read
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Parts read Given a set of specific parts ... skipped in 0.000s | name | description | quantity | | partA | descriptionA | 10 | | partB | descriptionB | 0 | | partC | descriptionC | 0 | And I read all "part" ... skipped in 0.000s When I read all "part" ... skipped in 0.000s Then the first item should have "name" equal to "partA" ... skipped in 0.000s And the first item should have "quantity" equal to number "10" ... skipped in 0.000s But the last item should have "name" equal to "partC" ... skipped in 0.000s And the last item should have "quantity" equal to number "0" ... skipped in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Single part read
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Single part read Given a set of specific parts ... skipped in 0.000s | name | description | quantity | | partA | descriptionA | 10 | | partB | descriptionB | 0 | | partC | descriptionC | 0 | And I read all "part" ... skipped in 0.000s When I read the first "part" ... skipped in 0.000s Then I should see the "name" is "partA" ... skipped in 0.000s And I should see the "quantity" is number "10" ... skipped in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Single part update
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Single part update Given a set of specific parts ... skipped in 0.000s | name | description | quantity | | partA | descriptionA | 10 | | partB | descriptionB | 0 | | partC | descriptionC | 0 | And I read all "part" ... skipped in 0.000s When I update the first part as follows ... skipped in 0.000s | name | description | quantity | | partE | descriptionE | 9 | Then I should see the "name" is "partE" ... skipped in 0.000s And I should see the "quantity" is number "9" ... skipped in 0.000s And I should see the "description" is "descriptionE" ... skipped in 0.000s When I read all "part" ... skipped in 0.000s Then the first item should have "name" equal to "partE" ... skipped in 0.000s And the first item should have "quantity" equal to number "9" ... skipped in 0.000s And the first item should have "description" equal to "descriptionE" ... skipped in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Single part delete
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Single part delete Given a set of specific parts ... skipped in 0.000s | name | description | quantity | | partA | descriptionA | 10 | | partB | descriptionB | 0 | | partC | descriptionC | 0 | And I read all "part" ... skipped in 0.000s When I delete the first "part" ... skipped in 0.000s Then the status code should be "204" ... skipped in 0.000s When I read all "part" ... skipped in 0.000s Then the first item should have "name" equal to "partB" ... skipped in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
